ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Allah has given birth'. They are truly liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God has begotten (children)?" They are liars indeed!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God has begotten a son.' They are certainly liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: That “Allah has offspring”; and indeed, surely, they are liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah has begotten." And, verily, they are liars!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Allah has begotten; and most surely they are liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God has begotten?' They are truly liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Allah hath begotten. Allah! verily they tell a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God has begotten children." They are truly liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: God hath begotten. Verily they are the liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Allah has begotten [offsprings],’ and they indeed speak a falsehood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah has begotten children"? but they are liars!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah has begotten off spring or children (i.e. angels are the daughters of Allah)?" And, verily, they are liars!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah has begotten' They are truly liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “God has begotten.” They are indeed lying.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:152] ‘God has begotten’, when they say that the angels are God’s daughters. And verily they are liars, in this [respect].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah hath begotten) for they claimed the angels were Allah's daughters. (And lo! verily they tell a lie) in what they say.
